module.name: StaticContentSample
module.param: This dashboard provides Windows PerfMon information regarding CPU utilization for the selected Desktop. Clicking on the hostname below will take you to a list of the running processes for that machine. To view the entire result set or for this report or manipulate the data further, click on the View Full Report link below.

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `perfmon_cpu` | stats last(Value) as Value by _time vm_name

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats values(vm_name) as vm first(_time) as f last(_time) as l | convert ctime(l) as l| convert ctime(f) as f | eval message = vm + " From: " + l + " to " + f | eval range="vmsreporting"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | timechart max(Value) as "Max % CPU" avg(Value) as "Avg % CPU" min(Value) as "Min % CPU"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats max(Value) as max avg(Value) as avg min(Value) as min by vm_name | eval avg = round(avg,2) | eval max = round(max,2) | eval min = round(min,2) | rename min as "Min %CPU" | rename max as "Max %CPU" | rename avg as "Avg %CPU"

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: $vm_name$ `perfmon_process` | table vm_name process_name Value counter instance | eval mem = if(counter=="Virtual Bytes",Value,"") | eval cpu = if(counter=="% Processor Time",Value,"") | eval ioread = if(counter="IO Read Operations/sec",Value,"") | eval iowrite = if(counter="IO Write Operations/sec",Value,"")
